page.title: 04 LYTTEL HALL
page.content: {Lyttel Hall}is the{Brewing {Research Foundation}near our school. The{Brewing Research Foundation}do research for the brewing companies, so that they can produce better quality beer. They have investors in{Britain and overseas. These companies help in the upkeep of{Lyttel Hall. {Lyttel Hall}used to be the home of a rich family, but it has been converted into laboratories and other rooms. It has a mini brewery and a special tasting room. The{Brewing Research Foundation tries t0 improve the foam, taste and clearness. They use the mini brewery to test different ways of making beer. On average one person drinks{200}pints of beer a year.
